post.body: I know! The cake and elevator scenes were the best. And the soldier saying "I feel good" at the end. Heroes rules!
go to sur la table and buy a bialetti mocha pot
i like kombucha, GT's brand: either the green or the guava one...but i'm a tea-a-holic, never drink soda, my pallette is tuned
mongolian bowl w/crispy tofu and brown rice :) and a vegan smore. YUM
especially with radio people! We get around
you got that straight fo sho!
parking was honestly the worst of it.
will do thank u!
usually I wake up at 4am so don't be jealous! ;)
GOSUNS!
i have days like that! but I follow so many good ppl w/valuable tweets, i can't help it sometimes
love how he points out "twitter takes time" as a misconception. totally just had this discussion w/a friend about time it takes
i know...there's something about being *first* though!
what does that do? That sounds harmful to plants...curious
maybe atvs should have gps locaters attached to them just for instances like this.
you're super close!
yeah, my frat boy called in sick today! much twittering happening, though i'm more a voyeaur today. busy news day.
you're at the airpark too?
scottsdale airpark...our westwood one offices are on the south end of the runway
congrats!
lmao
Lmao. Super niece got a shopping themed menorah from bubby. This I have to see.
Running out of time to clean out new roomie's room! Oh sh-t! But I AM super woman after all. Here I go...
wondering what sis got me for chrismukkah yesterday when she was here --------> http://ecogift.com/
http://twitpic.com/stcs - IMG00091.jpg
I got 8 hours of sleep! Without waking up! It's a miracle! 8 straight hours of sleep! I did it! I really did it!
Just watched heroes...good quotes this week from sylar! "Cake!" "Something wrong" and the marine "I feel good" love this show
seriously windy! my dad said it was 68 mph winds in flagstaff today.
Watching cat canoodle on the rug where I spilled kombucha green tea yesterday. Not quite sure what this is about.
Home from vegan dinner at green! Nom nom nom.
Switching to the on air twitter now @heathercast if you wanna listen and follow along. 987thepeak.com to listen on the internets
Goodmorning @xavierism mwah!
So bring a toy or food to monica at d-ridge and you can win an 09 ford flex. Or just go say hi and enter to win but the peak is there :)
Just banged out 3 errands! Firin' up the peak air studio, on air til 2pm. Monica is at desert ridge for operation santan claus! Yay!
I wanna be like j rich when I grow up! Go suns!
On the air, follow @heathercast which is my broadcast/podcast twitter
Btw @yogadanyoga put on an amazing soltice yoga shindig last night! Urbanyogaphx.com
So when did it become cool to shop in slippers and pj pants? And is this just a #phx thing?
I think in other families the one who stands around w/the stroller in the store is called "dad"
I am the lady w/the stroller in last chance; teenager is on cell. Sis and baby are shopping. I am here with a stroller coated in clothing
Still need to find shirts 4 the teenager which was the original shopping mission
We did marshalls and I am slightly more caught up on hanukkah shopping now...managed 1 gift for Sis she didn't see.
Shopping w/the teenager :)
Snack time after pilates, 2 slices of gluten free non dairy pizza :) which of course I doctored w/extra cheese and olives nom nom nom
Getting ready for pilates...and an entire weekend of chickworld! Just the girls! Woohoo!
Letting my relaxing weekend commence!
doin' entertainment news for all our stations
I tried. Kanye's heartless makes me want to eat kittens. @templestark, I gave this song enough chances
hope santa brings me a "pass" on my emissions test, tix to see the suns xmas day, and FREE time to be creative. 4 Hanukkah, I want lattkes!
Well, just got to the station and b.s.'N with steve
At the vw place--independent auto on 7th st and camelback. He's running the codes now so everyone pray I don't need a cat converter!
Some days you just have to listen to white denim.
there was fog in AZ today and I think I am staying in tonight to work. serious. you should probably crawl into your bomb shelter now.
hello, new follower with fab avatar ----> @onwave
just now catching up on following back new followers, so i apologize to my new followers!
wish i'd come up with this guy's idea ---------> @iwearyourshirt
http://twitpic.com/zwps - Scottsdale airport fogged in! IMG00139.jpg
Seriously very sick of working alone.
Wow...so foggy here at scottsdale airport this am. Fog is reminding me how I sooooo miss the bay area right now!
Pockets of fog up 51 and thick on greenway! Drive slow
